fire_blade.title: Flames of Destiny
fire_blade.text:
The blade erupts in warm, golden flames that don't burn you but dance 
along the steel like living things. You now wield the Fire Blade - a weapon 
of legend.

"Magnificent!" King Hellstrom exclaims. "But there is one more gift the stone 
can bestow. Every true hero needs a faithful companion."

Three magical circles appear on the throne room floor. Within each, a creature 
begins to materialize:

游낼 A DRAGON - Powerful in flight, breathes devastating fire
游냨 A DIREWOLF - Swift and cunning, loyal beyond measure  
游분 A GRIFFIN - Noble and proud, soars above any obstacle

"The Traveler's Stone will call forth whichever creature resonates with your 
spirit. Choose your eternal companion."

[WEAPON: Fire Blade equipped]

ice_blade.title: Frost of Destiny
ice_blade.text:
The blade becomes wreathed in crystalline ice that sparkles like diamonds. 
Frost patterns dance along the steel, and the air around you grows crisp and 
cold. You now wield the Ice Blade.

"The power of winter itself flows through that weapon," the King says in awe. 
"But your arsenal is not yet complete."

The Traveler's Stone glows, and three summoning circles appear before you:

游낼 A DRAGON - Master of ice and snow, breathes freezing blasts
游냨 A DIREWOLF - Hunter of winter, moves like a blizzard
游분 A GRIFFIN - Ice-winged majesty, ruler of mountain peaks

"Choose the companion that will stand by you in your quest."

[WEAPON: Ice Blade equipped]

lightning_blade.title: Storm of Destiny
lightning_blade.text:
Electric energy crackles along the blade's edge, and tiny bolts of 
lightning dance between your fingers. The weapon hums with barely contained 
power. You now wield the Lightning Blade.

"The very storms bow to your command," King Hellstrom breathes. "Now, for 
the final gift of the stone."

Three glowing circles manifest around you:

游낼 A DRAGON - Storm-caller, breathes lightning and thunder
游냨 A DIREWOLF - Swift as lightning, eyes like crackling sparks
游분 A GRIFFIN - Storm-rider, wings that command the winds

"From these noble beasts, choose your lifelong companion."

[WEAPON: Lightning Blade equipped]

fire_axe.title: Inferno of Power
fire_axe.text:
Flames engulf the great axe, but you feel no heat - only power flowing 
through your arms. Each practice swing leaves blazing trails in the air. 
You now wield the Fire Axe.

"A weapon befitting a warrior of legend," the King declares. "Now, choose 
your companion for the battles ahead."

Three summoning circles appear:

游낼 A DRAGON - Devastating in combat, breathes molten fire
游냨 A DIREWOLF - Fierce pack hunter, coat like living embers
游분 A GRIFFIN - Aerial warrior, wings trailing flames

"The stone awaits your choice."

[WEAPON: Fire Axe equipped]

ice_axe.title: Glacier's Edge
ice_axe.text:
The axe becomes covered in gleaming ice that never melts. With each swing, 
the air itself seems to freeze. You now wield the Ice Axe - a weapon of 
winter's fury.

"Cold as the mountain peaks, yet burning with power," King Hellstrom observes. 
"Choose your companion."

Three icy circles form:

游낼 A DRAGON - Ancient and wise, breathes blizzards
游냨 A DIREWOLF - Silent hunter, fur white as fresh snow
游분 A GRIFFIN - Mountain sovereign, wings of crystal ice

"Let the stone guide your choice."

[WEAPON: Ice Axe equipped]

lightning_axe.title: Thunder's Wrath
lightning_axe.text:
Lightning courses along the axe's edge, crackling with barely contained 
energy. The very air vibrates with power. You now wield the Lightning Axe - 
weapon of storms.

"The thunder itself obeys that blade," the King says with wonder. "Now choose 
your final companion."

Three electric circles pulse with energy:

游낼 A DRAGON - Lord of storms, commands wind and lightning
游냨 A DIREWOLF - Swift as lightning, eyes like storm clouds
游분 A GRIFFIN - Tempest rider, master of the stormy skies

"Make your choice, Storm-Bearer."

[WEAPON: Lightning Axe equipped]

fire_bow.title: Arrows of Flame
fire_bow.text:
The bow string glows like molten gold, and when you draw it, an arrow 
of pure fire materializes. The weapon thrums with elemental power. You now 
wield the Fire Bow.

"A weapon of precision and devastation," the King notes. "Choose your companion 
for the journey ahead."

Three fiery circles appear:

游낼 A DRAGON - Aerial archer's mount, breathes concentrated flame
游냨 A DIREWOLF - Fleet scout, eyes like burning coals
游분 A GRIFFIN - Sky hunter, feathers edged with fire

"The final choice awaits."

[WEAPON: Fire Bow equipped]

ice_bow.title: Frost Arrow
ice_bow.text:
The bow becomes covered in delicate frost patterns, and crystalline 
arrows form when you draw the string. You now wield the Ice Bow - precise 
and deadly.

"Each shot will freeze your enemies' hearts," the King says approvingly. 
"Choose your companion."

Three frost circles manifest:

游낼 A DRAGON - Wise and patient, breathes freezing mist
游냨 A DIREWOLF - Silent tracker, paws that leave frost prints
游분 A GRIFFIN - Ice-winged sniper, eyes like winter stars

"The stone awaits your final decision."

[WEAPON: Ice Bow equipped]

lightning_bow.title: Storm Archer
lightning_bow.text:
Electric energy dances along the bow, and arrows of pure lightning form 
at your command. The weapon hums with storm power. You now wield the Lightning Bow.

"Swift as lightning, accurate as thunder," King Hellstrom declares. "Choose 
your final companion."

Three electrical circles crackle to life:

游낼 A DRAGON - Storm lord, master of wind currents for perfect shots
游냨 A DIREWOLF - Lightning-fast scout, fur crackling with static
游분 A GRIFFIN - Thunder-wing, rides the storm winds

"Complete your destiny, young archer."

[WEAPON: Lightning Bow equipped]
